properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS IN ('U')

INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , PHONE , EMAIL ,USER_NICKNAME ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS ,TASTE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_USERNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? ,'user09' ,DEFAULT ,DEFAULT ,DEFAULT ,20 )
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = ?
